description.turkish: Nimbatus konteynırına aynı anda 5 Biyo Varil bırak
description.brazilian: Jogue 5 Barris Bio no contêiner do Nimbatus ao mesmo tempo

description.english: Freeze a bee and drop it off at the Nimbatus container
description.german: Frier eine Biene ein und wirf sie in den Nimbatus-Container
description.french: Congeler une abeille et la déposer dans le conteneur du Nimbatus
description.koreana: 벌 하나를 얼리고 Nimbatus 컨테이너에 떨어뜨리십시오
description.spanish: Congela una abeja y déjala caer en el contenedor de la Nimbatus
description.schinese: 冻结一只蜜蜂把它放进Nimbatus容器中。
description.tchinese: 凍結一隻蜜蜂並把牠丟進Nimbatus的貨倉
description.russian: Заморозьте пчелу и доставьте ее на Nimbatus
description.japanese: 蜂を凍らせ、Nimbatus のコンテナに入れる
description.polish: Zamroź pszczołę i wrzuć ją do pojemnika Nimbatusa
description.turkish: Bir arıyı dondur ve Nimbatus konteynırına bırak
description.brazilian: Congele uma abelha e a coloque no contêiner do Nimbatus

description.english: Destroy a Corp laboratory without disabling it's shield
description.german: Zerstöre ein Corp-Labor, ohne dessen Schild zu deaktivieren
description.french: Détruire un laboratoire Corp sans désactiver son bouclier
description.koreana: 방어막을 무력화하지 않고 기업 실험실을 파괴하십시오
description.spanish: Destruye un laboratorio de la Corporación sin desactivarle el escudo
description.schinese: 在不禁用它的护盾的情况下摧毁一个科尔公司实验室
description.tchinese: 在不停用防護罩的情況下摧毀科爾普的實驗室
description.russian: Уничтожить лабораторию Корпорации, не отключая ее защиту
description.japanese: シールドを無効化することなくコープスの研究所を破壊する
description.polish: Zniszcz laboratorium Korporacji bez deaktywacji jego tarcz
description.turkish: Kalkanı devre dışı bırakmadan bir Şirket laboratuarını yok et
description.brazilian: Destrua um laboratório da Corporação sem desativar o escudo dele
